name: Jewelry
pages: Spotlight a jewelry from each material with material stats

pages.title: Wood Jewelry
pages.text: Wood jewelry is the least powerful material.$(br)$(l)Max Level:$() $(4)2$()$br()$(l)Uses:$() $(1)40$()$(br)$(l)Mana:$() $(1)20$()$(br)$(l)Repairs:$() $(6)0$()$(br)

pages.title: Iron Jewelry
pages.text: Iron jewelry is very durability, having a high number of uses and very repairable.$(br)$(l)Max Level:$() $(4)3$()$br()$(l)Uses:$() $(1)200$()$(br)$(l)Mana:$() $(1)50$()$(br)$(l)Repairs:$() $(6)3$()$(br)$(l)Spell Duration:$() $(3)+25%$()$(br)

pages.title: Copper Jewelry
pages.text: Copper jewelry has a higher level than iron, but not as durable.$(br)$(l)Max Level:$() $(4)4$()$br()$(l)Uses:$() $(1)75()$(br)$(l)Mana:$() $(1)50$()$(br)$(l)Repairs:$() $(6)1$()$(br)$(l)Spell Cooldown:$() $(3)-5%$()$(br)$(l)Spell Frequency:$() $(3)+5%$()$(br)
